full_text: EPSTEIN # 76318-054 CPAP MACHINE. From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) NYM/Correctional Sys (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/12 14:15 Subject: EPSTEIN # 76318-054 CPAP MACHINE. Attachments: TEXTT.htm The above inmate said he had his CPAP machine with him at the time of his arrest. He needs to have his CPAP machine for his medical condition. Is it in R and D or can we find out who has his CPAP machine? Thanks. Page 11259 DOJ-OGR-00023935

text_blocks.content: The above inmate said he had his CPAP machine with him at the time of his arrest. He needs to have his CPAP machine for his medical condition. Is it in R and D or can we find out who has his CPAP machine?

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C). The document appears to be an email regarding Jeffrey Epstein's CPAP machine.
